name: io.github.wshobson/maverick-mcp
description: Stock analysis MCP server with S&P 500 data, technical indicators, and AI research tools.

remotes.name: sse
remotes.description: SSE transport for web-based clients and remote connections
setup_instructions: Install dependencies: uv sync (or pip install -e .)
Copy .env.example to .env and add your TIINGO_API_KEY
Start server: make dev (or uv run python -m maverick_mcp.api.server --transport sse --port 8003)

environment_variables.name: TIINGO_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Required API key for Tiingo stock data provider. Get free key at https://tiingo.com (500 requests/day free tier)

environment_variables.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Optional API key for OpenRouter (400+ AI models with intelligent cost optimization). Get at https://openrouter.ai

environment_variables.name: EXA_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Optional API key for Exa web search (advanced research features). Get at https://exa.ai

environment_variables.name: TAVILY_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Optional API key for Tavily web search (research features). Get at https://tavily.com

environment_variables.name: FRED_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Optional API key for Federal Reserve Economic Data (macroeconomic indicators). Get at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/

environment_variables.name: DATABASE_URL
environment_variables.description: Optional database URL. Defaults to SQLite (sqlite:///maverick_mcp.db) if not provided. PostgreSQL supported for better performance.

environment_variables.name: REDIS_HOST
environment_variables.description: Optional Redis host for enhanced caching performance. Defaults to in-memory caching if not provided.

remotes.name: streamable-http
remotes.description: Streamable HTTP transport for remote access via mcp-remote bridge
setup_instructions: Install dependencies: uv sync (or pip install -e .)
Copy .env.example to .env and add your TIINGO_API_KEY
Start server: make dev (or uv run python -m maverick_mcp.api.server --transport streamable-http --port 8003)
Connect via mcp-remote: npx mcp-remote http://localhost:8003/mcp/
